song_lyrics: Pramukh Swāmīe ā brahmānḍe, amrutnī helī kīdhī;
Parimal hīṇī am nikunje, madhur tamārā spandan gunje;
Pāp punjne dhoīne mārī, bhavnī khārap harī;
Dosh mārā lesh na joyā, kānṭāḷe antar paṇ mohyā;
Shraddhānā vaṇ vāvī vāvī, virāṭ chādar bharī;
Mīṭ bharīne kīdhā kāmaṇ, pardeshī toy neh nibhāvaṇ;
Hamesh vasvā haiyā gharmā, līlī kunjo karī;
Andhāre ajvāḷu thaī thaī, ā sansāre jharṇu thaī thaī;
Avirat vichare Akshar karvā, Pramukhaswarūpe Hari;
title: Pramukh Swāmīe ā brahmānḍe amrutnī helī kīdhī

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-168: Sadhu Aksharjivandas

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad

Raag(s): Brindãvani Sarang
